snippet: After the installation of cameras and boards announcing compliance rates, hand washing at an I.C.U. soared, a study shows.
abstract: Dr Bruce F Farber study published in journal Clinical Infectious Diseases finds that installing cameras in washrooms is a simple and effective way of getting hospital workers to wash their hands consistently.
lead_paragraph: After the installation of cameras and boards announcing compliance rates, hand washing at an I.C.U. soared, a study shows.

headline.seo: When Watched and Cheered On, I.C.U. Workers Wash Hands More
headline.main: Prevention: Cameras Can Help Ensure Hand Washing
headline.print_headline: Prevention: Cameras Can Help Ensure Hand Washing
